document.full_text: in june, president barack obama is to present the medal of freedom, the highest u.s. civilian distinction, to chancellor angela merkel, whose country has been less than forceful on freedom.
document.title: politicus: awkward moment for obama and merkel
lines_and_colors: in june, president barack obama is to present the medal of freedom, the highest u.s. civilian distinction, to chancellor angela merkel, whose country has been less than forceful on freedom.
